greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The sequency numbers of the 32 rows of a Hadamard-Walsh matrix, order 32.
comment: See A240908 for context.  This sequence is the natural sequency ordering for an order 32 matrix.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, A Library of Hadamard Matrices
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hadamard Matrix
formula: Recursion: H(2) = [1 1; 1 -1]; H(n) = H(n-1) * H(2), where * is the Kronecker matrix product.
example: This is a fixed length sequence of only 32 values, as given in full above.
xref: Cf. A240908 "natural order" sequencies for Hadamard-Walsh matrix, order 8.
Cf. A240909 "natural order" sequencies for Hadamard-Walsh matrix, order 16.
Cf. A153141 "dyadic order" sequencies for Hadamard-Walsh matrix, all orders.
Cf. A000975(n) is sequency of last row of H(n). - _William P. Orrick_, Jun 28 2015
results.author: _Ross Drewe_, Apr 14 2014
ext: Definition of H(n) corrected by _William P. Orrick_, Jun 28 2015
